title: unfair low priority
body: so first off i have a slow and old computer and very often i can play league of legends but sometimes i start to get frame lag really bad and i mean 2 fps i cant play like that without just feeding so i quit the game to relaunch i always come back i never quit to just quit but this last time my game crashed and now i have to wait 20 minutes to play a game the game crashing wasnt my fault and i still was able to come back at the last second and help me team win please tell me how i can fix this{{champion:78}} {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body:
A low-priority queue never happens from disconnecting from a single match. These show up on your account after a trend of disconnections has happened. 

It sounds like there may be some hardware or driver issues causing your crash due to the low fps and game crash. I strongly recommend working through the steps in our [Bugsplat & Crash guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) as a first step in resolving this.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.

i meet the minimum requirements and the majority of the time i can run the game smoothly but everyone once and a while the game crashes and i get punished for it .i{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}  do not think this is fair .isnt there a way for the game to know if i quit or if my game crashed?

Regardless of intent, a disconnection negatively impacts everyone in the match. This is a key reason why disconnections are all treated equally and why penalties cannot be modified.

Did the guide I linked cause any change in your stability in-game?
